name: Wizard Golf RPG
description:
If you thought you have played every type of dungeon crawler out there then get ready for Wizard Golf RPG.
This is an RPG mixed with the rules of golf! You play a wizard who has to cast as few spells as possible to get to the exit of each dungeon. Along the way you must fight monsters, collect loot and upgrade your skills.


Features.
- Fight your way through 12 courses, each with 9 holes
- Try to get through the courses using as few magic spells as possible
- Explore diverse settings such as castles, dungeons, grassy fields, and hellish depths
- Go for par or try to find the hidden golden skulls.
- Buy new weapons like the boomerang and bomb rod using the loot you collect in game
